name: 绽于枝垂樱下~Flowering Across the Hakugyokurou
detailed_description:
How to Play:


This game is a visual novel.
There are Five chapters in this game with no side story or other ending. Players may need more than one hour to finish this game.

Story:


I woke up from the gap just like before.
...
Why do I dreamt about things at that time?
...
In this case, I haven't been to Hakugyokurou for a while.
...
I drunk some tea to make myself awake.
...
It's still a normal day and I didn't do anything.
...
In this case, maybe I should visit Hakugyokurou.

Other：


-This is a Touhou Project fan game.
-The game has some levels of changes of the setting from the original game and contains breakdown of characters and Yuri.

short_description: 《Flowering Across the Hakugyokurou》is a short Vision Novel Touhou Project Fan Fiction game. The main story is about a love story of Yuyuko and Yukari. This game will tell a story that happened before Yuyuko died.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows XP
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 2000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8200
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 560SE
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
